snippet: The championship Egyptian soccer team Al Ahly plans to sell a player who used a four-fingered gesture linked to supporters of the country’s ousted Islamist president, Mohammed Morsi.
abstract: Championship Egyptian soccer team Al Ahly plans to sell Ahmed Abdul Zaher, player who used a four-fingered gesture linked to supporters of the country’s ousted Islamist president, Mohammed Morsi, after scoring in league game.
lead_paragraph: The championship Egyptian soccer team Al Ahly plans to sell a player who used a four-fingered gesture linked to supporters of the country’s ousted Islamist president, Mohammed Morsi.

headline.main: Egyptian Soccer Team to Sell Player After Gesture
